description: Israeli tanks and soldiers entered emergency and surgery departments, an official said
maintext: The UN agency for Palestinian refugees said on Tuesday that its fuel depot in Gaza was empty and that it would soon cease relief operations, including bringing limited supplies of food and medicine in from Egypt for the more than 600,000 people sheltering in severely overcrowded UN-run schools and other facilities in the south.
title: Israeli troops storm Gaza's al Shifa hospital in hunt for Hamas
